titleStmt.title: To every individuall member of the supreme authority of the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England, but more especially to Colonell George Thompson chairman to the committee for regulating the new import of excise, and particularly for that of sope The humble addresse of Lieutenant Coll. John Lilburne, a freeman of the Common-wealth of England.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.
